page.title: 03SPORT
page.content: { Snooker}is the most popular sport.We went round fifteen houses and six people played snooker.Twelve people did not play in local teams.Two people play for a{football}team.Nobody plays in a{darts}team or for a{tennis}club. Eight of the people interviewed play sport in their spare time and seven do not. We are lucky to have so many facilities in our area.We have a {bowling}green ,two tennis courts, a {badminton}court,football pitches,cycle {speedway}track{,table tennis}tables, dart boards and of course snooker and {pool}tables. Most people interviewed participated in some form of sport.
